ValidationRule.description: Case Sentiment are required on Resolved Cases for Service and Saver teams
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISNEW() = TRUE) || ISCHANGED(Status) ) && ISPICKVAL( Status , "Resolved") && ( $Profile.Name = 'Saver Manager' || $Profile.Name = 'Saver User' || $Profile.Name = 'Service Manager' || $Profile.Name = 'Service User' || $Profile.Name = 'Lightning Service User' || $Profile.Name = 'Lightning Saver User' || $Profile.Name = 'Lightning Service Manager' ) && ISBLANK(TEXT( Case_Sentiment__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter Case Sentiment before Resolving the Case
